text: RNLD may refer to: * Resource Network for Linguistic Diversity, an organisation aiming to advance the sustainability of the world's Indigenous languages * Registered Nurse Learning Disabilities, the title used to designate nurses who are registered with the Nursing and Midwifery Council (NMC) one of 4 fields of nursing in the United Kingdom == See also == * RNL Architecture, formerly known as RNL Design, American company
title: RNLD
